title: [REQ] Option to not generate go.mod and go.sum
description:
Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

Currently, the generated go client library always includes go.mod and go.sum files.

Describe the solution you'd like

I would like to have an option in the configuration file to not generate go.mod and go.sum files.

Describe alternatives you've considered

Currently, to overcome the issue I remove the generated files after the code generation ends

Additional context

I am working on adding a code-generated client package to Cayley. For it to work correctly the generated client directory must not include go.mod and go.sum
